definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: a city of the Philistines (As. Isqaluna COT:Gloss Dl:Pa 290; Ph. adj. gent. cf. infr.) Ju Jdg 1:18, Jdg 14:19, 1Sa 6:17, 2Sa 1:20, Je 25:20, Je 47:5, Je 47:7, Am 1:8, Zep 2:4, Zep 2:7, Zec 9:5, Zec 9:5; on the Medit. Sea, S. of W. fr. Jerusalem, mod. ‘ Asqalân, Survey:iii. 237 f. (with plan); cf. also ZPV:ii. 164 f.
